title.narrative: GUY 2.2 EDUCATION PLANNING & MONITORING

description.narrative: Enhanced capacity of national and subnational entities in education planning, collection and use of data, system monitoring and budgeting, to provide equitable, inclusive and relevant education for all children and adolescents by 2021, which contributes to Access To Quality Learning Opportunities, Education In Emergencies, Education â€“ General, Equity â€“ Focus On Girls' And Inclusive Education, Evaluation, Learning And Child-Friendly Schools, Learning, Skills, Participation And Engagement, Research. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, Systems Strengthening To Leave No One Behind. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2021, all children and adolescents, especially the most disadvantaged among them, have improved their education and developmental outcomes and accessed equitable and inclusive learning environments across the life cycle, including in emergencies.
